General.Name: EMC Instytut Medyczny SA
General.Description: EMC Instytut Medyczny SA owns hospitals and outpatient clinics in Poland. The company offers private medical care, specialist consultations, primary health care, outpatient rehabilitation, and long-term care services. It is also involved in research and development activities in the field of medical sciences and pharmacy. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Wroclaw, Poland.
